item.title: Day 1 - Time Series Prediction
item.description: Practical info Place: PH Ovnhallen Time: 09:50 - 15.10 We will be looking at LSTMs and financial forecasting. There will be also space for you to pitch assignment ideas and receive feedback. Schedule for the day Time Activity Material 9:50-10.50 Recap ANN Notebook 11:00-12:00 Intro Timeseries Forecasting Notebook 12:00-12:30 Lunch 12:30-13:00 Meet former graduates 13:00-14:00 LSTM stock prediction Notebook 14:00-15:00 Intro Timseries Transformers Notebook 15:00-15:10 Wrapping up the day
